mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, gender, real_name, tel, email, role, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, password, gender, real_name, tel, email, role, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
